picked_headlines.summary: STAGE models LLM workloads for scalable AI system optimization.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: STAGE offers a comprehensive framework for distributed AI systems, crucial for engineers and tech leaders aiming to optimize large-scale AI deployments.

picked_headlines.summary: MOON boosts e-commerce ads CTR by 20% with multimodal learning.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: MOON's impact on e-commerce through multimodal learning highlights practical applications of AI in product marketing, relevant for both engineers and business stakeholders.

digest:
- *AI-Salesman* introduces a framework for telemarketing using LLMs, addressing challenges with new datasets and metrics. More details at https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.12133
- *Uni-MoE-2.0-Omni* advances multimodal AI with dynamic MoE design, achieving SOTA performance on 85 benchmarks. Read more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.12609
- *Characterizing Energy Footprint* evaluates small language models on edge devices, highlighting trade-offs in performance and power consumption. Explore the study at https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11624
- *The Anatomy of a Triton Attention Kernel* presents a new kernel for efficient LLM inference across GPUs, achieving significant performance improvements. Find out more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11581
- *Spark-Prover-X1* enhances theorem proving in LLMs using diverse data and a novel training framework, achieving state-of-the-art results. Discover the framework at https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.13043
- *WebCoach* enhances web agents with cross-session memory for improved learning and performance in complex browsing tasks. Learn more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.12997
- *DenseAnnotate* offers an audio-driven method for creating dense image and 3D scene annotations, enhancing training data quality for MLLMs. More information at https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.12452
- *HARNESS* is an AI system for predicting hazards in DOE environments, enhancing safety through human collaboration and adaptive learning. Details available at https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.10810
- *AI Agent-Driven Framework* automates product knowledge graph construction from unstructured data, enhancing e-commerce data integration and retrieval. Read the full article at https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11017
- *StreamDiT* enables real-time text-to-video generation with improved quality and efficiency, achieving 16 FPS on a single GPU. Explore the technology at https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.03745
